timestamp.description: The time at which the measurement was taken. For example, 2018-01-01T12:00:00Z.

measurement_subject.description: The device which created the measurement. For example, a sensor ID or a device ID.

measurement_of.description: The thing which was measured. For example, a measure-temperature or state.

measurement_value.description: The value of the measurement. For example, 23.5 or Home.

measurement_data_type.description: The data type of the measurement value. Must be one of: string, number, or boolean.

correlation_id.description: A unique ID that can be used to correlate multiple measurements together. For example, a unique ID for a user or a session.
